verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of praise.<WH8426> Make a joyful noise<WH7321> unto the LORD,<WH3068> all<WH3605> ye lands.<WH776>
Serve <WH5647> the<WH853> LORD<WH3068> with gladness:<WH8057> come<WH935> before his presence<WH6440> with singing.<WH7445>

Know <WH3045> ye that<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> he<WH1931> is God:<WH430> it is he<WH1931> that hath made<WH6213> us, and not<WH3808> we ourselves;<WH587> we are his people,<WH5971> and the sheep<WH6629> of his pasture.<WH4830>
Enter <WH935> into his gates<WH8179> with thanksgiving,<WH8426> and into his courts<WH2691> with praise:<WH8416> be thankful<WH3034> unto him, and bless<WH1288> his name.<WH8034>
For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> is good;<WH2896> his mercy<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769> and his truth<WH530> endureth to<WH5704> all generations.<WH1755> <WH1755>
